sections.title: Project Progress Update

points.header: **Jane Doe** provided a general update on the current status of the project.

points: Key milestones have been met:
Phase 1 (Research & Planning) completed.
Phase 2 (Prototype Development) in progress, 80% complete.
Some minor delays due to external dependencies, expected to finish within the next week.

sections.title: Design Feedback

points.header: **Alice Brown** shared new UI/UX designs for the mobile app interface.

points: Feedback from stakeholders:
Positive response to the color scheme and general layout.
Need to improve navigation flow, especially for first-time users.

points.header: **Action Item**: Alice to revise the design based on feedback and send the updated version by EOD Friday.

sections.title: Technical Issues & Development Progress

points.header: **John Smith** raised concerns regarding the integration of third-party API for the payment gateway.

points: Issue with the API documentation clarity, some features are not well-documented.
Proposed action: **John** will reach out to the third-party vendor for clarification and support.

points.header: **Action Item**: John to schedule a meeting with the vendor by Friday, December 29th.

sections.title: Marketing Strategy for Launch

points.header: **Mark Lee** presented the marketing plan for the product launch.

points: Focus on digital channels (social media, email marketing, influencer partnerships).
Special attention to be given to the upcoming holiday season for maximum engagement.

points.header: **Action Item**: Mark to prepare the social media content calendar and share it with the team by next week.

sections.title: Quality Assurance (QA) and Testing

points.header: **Sarah White** discussed the current testing progress.

points: The QA team has identified some minor bugs in the latest build, mostly related to user login.
Plan: Continue testing and escalate critical issues to the development team within 24 hours.

points.header: **Action Item**: Sarah to ensure all test cases are updated in the system by next Tuesday.

sections.title: Budget Review
points: The project is within budget, but some additional funds may be needed for unforeseen expenses related to API integration.

points.header: **Action Item**: Jane to submit a revised budget request by the end of next week.

points: Revised UI design to be sent by Alice by Friday.
John to contact API vendor for clarifications.
Marketing content calendar to be finalized by Mark by next week.
QA team to continue testing and prioritize critical bugs.

sections.title: Decisions Made
points: Revised UI design to be sent by Alice by Friday.
John to contact API vendor for clarifications.
Marketing content calendar to be finalized by Mark by next week.
QA team to continue testing and prioritize critical bugs.

sections.title: Action Items
points: **Alice Brown** : Revise UI design and send by Friday, December 29th.
**John Smith** : Contact API vendor for clarification on documentation and set up a meeting by Friday.
**Mark Lee** : Prepare and share marketing content calendar by January 3rd.
**Sarah White** : Ensure all test cases are updated and report progress by next Tuesday, January 2nd.
**Jane Doe** : Submit a revised budget request by January 5th.
